duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate sweetland presses, carbonation, blow-ups, and other filtration equipment
Start, stop, and adjust equipment to direct process material to proper tanks or presses
Control temperature, flow, and density of process material and make all necessary adjustments
Position and change filter leaves, observe operation of presses, and ensure proper tank level
Prepare and add refining agents, take samples, record process data, and report to Foreman if outside specified tolerance
Work in accordance with established safety practices and sanitation standards
